articles.author: John Paul M. Joaquin
articles.title: WhatsApp Finally Lets Users Send HD Videos - iTech Post
articles.description: WhatsApp now allows its users to send and receive HD videos WhatsApp users can now send and receive HD videos through the app's platform.  The company behind the secure messaging app has reportedly released the feature that lets WhatsApp users send and receiv…
articles.content:
WhatsApp users can now send and receive HD videos through the app's platform.
